features: Gosling Graduate System allows the sleeves to lengthen by 1 ½ inch to grow with your child
One interior stretch mesh pocketInterior collar lined with brushed tricot for softness and warmth
Rubberized, elasticized snow skirt with adjustable snap closure
Easy to care for: remove fur ruff, machine wash cold in a front loading washer, and tumble dry low
Down filled hood is removable, and has a removable Coyote fur ruff to make cleaning easier
Storm flap over centre front zipper secured with Canada Goose logo snaps
Goose I.D. hand-me-down label on interior
Reflective piping on the opening cuff edges and yokes for visibility
Cut longer in the back for more protection from the cold and the wind
Two drop in cargo pockets with secondary side entry fleece lined handwarmer pockets
Recessed rib knit cuffs to keep out the cold
